data.title: Internal Medicine & Geriatrics located in Sun City, AZ
data.meta_description: Share your own feedback and see what others are saying about The Maxwell Group, trusted Internal Medicine & Geriatrics providing care to Sun City, AZ.
data.text:
We had our family Dr for 32 years. When my husband went Home and I was alone it was difficult for me to make the change as I moved. Adjustment is always necessary. Dr. Johnson has always been very kind and understanding, making things clear when necessary and alway giving guidance as to what to do next. I recommend him highly. His quiet spirit and deep knowledge helps when you are having things happen to you when you are 89, and need a person to stand with you and walk through your health situations with you. I go away from the office with a peaceful mind. I know you will like him. You won't be sorry. Marge H.

I recently changed from Kaiser Permanente (CA) to Banner Medicare Advantage Prime HMO (AZ). Having been with KP for over 40 years, needless to say, I was reluctant to make this change. However, after my doctor visits with Dr. Shui (Maxwell Group), I couldn't be more happier with my new Primary Care Physician!! Dr. Shui is so incredibly personable and very caring! While I know he has other patients, whenever I come to see him, he makes me feel that I am his ONLY patient! Dr. Shui goes above and beyond to understand my medical history and he always provides me knowledgeable responses to any questions that I may have. Upon leaving my appointments with him, I always tell him "Thank you Dr. Shui for taking such good care of me!" I also have to say "thank you" to his assistant, Amber. Like Dr. Shui, Amber is very professional and extremely kind. If you are in search of a highly skilled, caring doctor, look no more! I highly recommend Dr. Yujie Shui and his assistant Amber for all of your primary care needs!!
